attributes.action: DO NOT pay the Ukraine gas bill without obtaining a mandate by referendum of the taxpayers of this country.
attributes.additional_details: We know you will tell us how good for the country it will be if you were to do this - especially if you don't take it out of the existing Foreign Aid Fund and borrow the money to be able to do it - but we STILL want an opportunity to approve or refuse this payment BECAUSE IT'S OUR MONEY AND NOT YOURS!
